alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis and Clark (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 5:21PM MDT until July 09 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Montana, including the following counties, in southwest Montana, Jefferson. In west central Montana, Lewis and Clark. * WHEN...Until 700 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Clancy, Alhambra, Jefferson City, Corbin, Austin, Rimini, Wickes, Black Sandy State Park and York. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
